entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Low minus 6 except minus 10 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
